author: kaushalye
msg: 1. Extended asymmetric encryption support for algorithm RSA-OAEP in OMXMLSecurity.
2. Modified rampart to configure it to use RSA-OAEP to transport the symmetric key.
3. Modified rampart action to hold a certificate/key as a string.
